maqras.text: Ini: "ippuweeea yi d, ar agraw n leonun ssemeessen, u nnan: ih, nesla i Leqwoan, d lwehma
Inehhu ar uuwab, d$a numen yis. I Mass nne$, ur nepcarak yiwen
U Neppa, gedha s loeos n Mass nne$ Aalayan, ur Isai tameddakwelt, ne$ uummi S
Ih, abuhal nne$ ieekku, af Oebbi, ixmioen
Nekwni nenwa leonun akked imdanen, ur sawalen, af Oebbi, tikerkas, d awez$i
Ih, seg imdanen, llan irgazen ijjemen ddkeo n leonun. Snernan lbe$wv nnsen
S tidep, $ilen, akken t$ilem, ar Oebbi ur d Isskar yiwen, d awez$i
Aql a$ nqelleb igenni, nufa t iccuo d iassasen uqsieen, akked ijujae
Nella nep$imi $uoes, seg imukan nessemeas; win issemeessen tura, a t id immager usafu d aaessas
Nekwni, ur neeoi ma iura lhemm, af at ddunit, ne$ ma Ib$a, Mass nnsen, ad pwanhun
Llan garane$ iaaoviyen, llan wid ur nemain; ur naadil iberdan
Nmeyyez nufa, war ccekk, ur nesfunnug Oebbi di tmurt, ur T nesfunnug ma nerwel
Nnhaya mi s nesla, yis numen. Win iumnen s Mass is, ur ippagwad ara t ixauen, ne$ ara t ivuooen
Ih, garane$ imvuaen, garane$ laauuap. Wid iunzen, widak, xtaoen lewqam
Ma d laauuap, di Loahennama, d nitni ay d is$aoen
Lemmer deg ubrid ay ddan, yili Nefka yasen aman iqwan
A ten njeooeb yissen. Win iooan asmekti n Mass is, ad isaaddi aaaqeb aqesean
Leowamaa n Oebbi. Ur naaoet yiwen ar tama n Oebbi
Atan, mi ikker umdan n Oebbi ad inuj $ureS, qoib lesqen $uoes
Ini: "pnuju$ kan ar Mass iw, ur aS pcarake$ yiwen
Ini: "nek, ur pwakelfe$ $ef vveoo nnwen ne$ $ef nnhaya nnwen
Ini: "nek, ur iyi ipfukku yiwen seg ufus n Oebbi, d awez$i. War Neppa, ur ppafe$ ssoan
siwa anabi s$uo Oebbi, akked tebrap iS". Ih, i wid iauuan Oebbi akked Umazan iS, times n Loahennama, ad wekkoen degs, i lebda
Alamma mi walan ayen i sen ippuwaaaden, ad eoen anwi ay d uohifen mavi, i leslak, anwi drus iten mavi
Ini: "ur eoi$ ma iqeob ed wayen i wen ippuweaaden, ne$ ma a t Iweooel Mass iw
Amusnaw n tbavnit; tabavnit iS, ur p Immal i yiwen
Kkes ed win Iouva d amazan. Winna, iteddu, zdat deffir, s iassasen
Ad Ieeo ma ssawven tibratin n Mass nnsen. Izzi i wayen akw illan $uosen, Ieeppeb yal cci s imvanen
A win isburen
Aawez, xas cwii
Azgen n yiv, ne$ ssenqes segs, acemma
Ne$ rnu yas. Di Leqwoan uuun leqoaya
Aql a£, ad ak d Nini awal amray
Ccaw n yiv, ieeaeay kteo asurif, u issewqam kteo leqoaya
Deg wass, s tidep, tce$wlev, macci d kra
Mmekti d isem n Mass ik, lhu yideS, akken iwata
Mass ugmuv akked utaram, ur illi oebbi siwa Neppa. Ihi, sau T d Awkil
Eubeo i innan nnsen, faoeq iten s leedaqa
Eoo iyI inekkaoen, akked usaiyen; efk asen cwii n lmudda
£uone£, s tidep, slasel akked tmes ioeqqen
lqut ipceooiqen, aaaqeb aqeoean
Ass ideg tamurt akked idurar ad rgagin, idurar ad u$alen am oomel ippazalen
Atan Nuzen awen ed Amazan, d anagi nnwen, akken Nuzen amazan i Feraun
Feraun iauua amazan. Newwet it tiyta tuqsiet
Amek ara teezzbem, ma tnekkoem ass ideg igwerdan ad caben
Segs, ad icerreg igenni, ad iuao wayen i wen Iwaaaed
Atan wagi d asmekti; win ioe$ben ad iawi abrid ar Mass is
